ordered.subject: Order Placed
ordered.body: Your order has been successfully placed. Stay tuned for order updates

cancelled.subject: Order Cancelled
cancelled.body: Your order has been cancelled. We're sorry to see that you had to cancel your order, we hope you can find what you are looking for

outfordelivery.subject: Order is Out for Delivery
outfordelivery.body: Your order is out for delivery, please expect your order to be delivered today

delivered.subject: Order Delivered
delivered.body: Your order has been successfully delivered. Please write a review on our application
